first a few facts:1st this repack is what it claims to be; 2nd it's virus free; 3d the game instals and works without problems (although I had to run the game in compatibility mode for xp..probably because it uses unreal3 engine)........Last: thank you azaq318 for your work--we appreciate it;-

p.s.: as to the quality of the game itself I'll only say try it ...and then imagine it would have been done in the assasins style..uhhh....
Not working, the first video plays then game shuts down

ok, dunno if this will work for everyone but i managed to fix blank screen the game and get it to run perfictly,,i compleatly uninstalled my pysx driver then downloaded the latest version from nvidia, reinstalled the driver from scratch,  then started the game,,it seems to have solved it for me so far,hope this will help  oh yea, and dont play the game in full screen unless you know for def your monitor/lcd tv will be ok with the res,,otherwise you  might have to reinstall the game,,but apart from that no probs for me.
